scripts.alpha: yarn run swap:alpha && firebase use alpha && yarn run env:set && yarn run deploy:rules && yarn run deploy:functions
scripts.alpha:local: yarn run swap:alpha && firebase use alpha
scripts.beta: yarn run swap:beta && firebase use beta && yarn run env:set && yarn run deploy:rules && yarn run deploy:functions
scripts.beta:local: yarn run swap:beta && firebase use beta
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:dist && yarn run clean:tsbuildinfo
scripts.env:set: test -f env.json && firebase functions:config:unset env --token ${FIREBASE_TOKEN} && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat env.json)" --token ${FIREBASE_TOKEN}
scripts.env:set:local: test -f env.json && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat env.json)"
scripts.firebase:alpha: yarn run alpha:local && yarn run start
scripts.firebase:beta: yarn run beta:local && yarn run start
scripts.firebase:master: yarn run master:local && yarn run start
scripts.master: yarn run swap:master && firebase use master && yarn run env:set && yarn run deploy:rules && yarn run deploy:functions
scripts.master:local: yarn run swap:master && firebase use master
scripts.staging:alpha: yarn run swap:alpha && firebase use alpha && yarn run test
scripts.staging:beta: yarn run swap:beta && firebase use beta && yarn run test
scripts.staging:master: yarn run swap:master && firebase use master && yarn run test
scripts.start: yarn run env:get:local && firebase emulators:start --only firestore,functions,pubsub --inspect-functions
scripts.typescript: yarn run clean && tsc -b . && tscpaths -p tsconfig.json -s ./src -o ./dist
